ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Motion Picture - Echoes
ComicInfo.Summary: Echoes Part 1: Investigating a spatial anomaly, the Enterprise encounters a ship whose only occupant is a parallel universe counterpart of Uhura, who is in pursuit of a war criminal from her universe who is a counterpart of Chekov.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 04:55:15. [CVDB989991] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:21:41. [Issue ID 2531779]
ComicInfo.Characters: Mr. Spock (mirror universe, flashback),Commander Spock,Commander Montgomery Scott [Scotty],Dr. Christine Chapel,General Nyota Uhura (parallel universe),Dr. Leonard McCoy [Bones],Lt. Commander Nyota Uhura,Admiral Ubah Mohamed,unnamed Starfleet officers,Lt. Commander Hikaru Sulu,Lt. Pavel Chekov,Admiral James T. Kirk
